Title: MuPDF: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in MuPDF, the worst of
    which allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition or
    have other unspecified impact.

Background.Text: A lightweight PDF, XPS, and E-book viewer.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MuPDF. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted PDF document or image using MuPDF, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition or have other unspecified impact.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All MuPDF users should upgrade to the latest version:
